2761.T.summary: Toshin Group Co.,Ltd. supplies electrical equipment and materials. The company offers high voltage receiving boards, electric wires/cables, terminal processing products, distribution board control panels, VE conduit and accessories, electric circuit and insulating materials, TV hearing and measuring instruments, telephone poles and overhead wires, wood and interior products, lightning rods and equipment, air conditioners and ventilation fans, home appliances, and tools. It also provides high pressure, switch and control, wiring, disaster prevention, acoustic communication, communication, gas, building material housing, and OA equipment. The company was formerly known as Toshin Electric Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Toshin Group Co.,Ltd. in November 2006. Toshin Group Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1947 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

2777.T.summary: CASSINA IXC. Ltd. plans, manufactures, imports, and sells furniture and house holding articles in Japan. The company offers sofas/benches, chair stools, table consoles, desks, storage products/TV boards, outdoor products, beds, mirrors, dresser hangers, illumination products, rugs, curtains/fabrics, art products, household goods, and quilt linen. It also provides interior design and office planning services. CASSINA IXC. Ltd. sells its products through its shops. The company was formerly known as Cassina Japan Inc. and changed its name to CASSINA IXC. Ltd. in May 2002. CASSINA IXC. Ltd. was founded in 1980 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

29F.SG.summary: Fujitsu General Limited provides air conditioners worldwide. The company offers split and multi split air conditioning systems; air purification systems and deodorizers; fire and disaster prevention systems, and distribution/video systems; and vehicle-mounted cameras. It also provides CCD cameras; low noise blockdown converters and transmitters; and technical services, such as EMC measurement, testing, and consulting services. Fujitsu General Limited was founded in 1936 and is headquartered in Kawasaki, Japan.

3421.T.summary: Inaba Seisakusho Co., Ltd. engages in the engineering, manufacture, sale, and support of office furniture and outdoor storage sheds in Japan. Its office furniture products include desks, meeting tables, office chairs, office partitions, storage cabins, and other items; and outdoor storage sheds comprise motorbike sheds/garages and public storage/cycle ports, as well as small, medium, and large sheds. The company was founded in 1950 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

4665.T.summary: Duskin Co., Ltd. engages in the care service, dust control, and food businesses in Japan and internationally. It rents and sells cleaning products and home healthcare items; provides cosmetics and health food products; maintains plants and flowers; and offers home cleaning and helper, pest control and prevention, home repair, and professional cleaning services, as well as home care services for seniors. The company is also involved in the rental, sale, and cleaning of uniforms; delivery of mineral water and coffee; rental of special event and daily-use items; and provision of sanitary environments for medical institutions. In addition, it operates bakery shops, pie specialty stores, chiffon cake specialty shops, pork cutlet restaurants, and hamburger and donut shops. Duskin Co., Ltd. was founded in 1963 and is headquartered in Osaka, Japan.

5941.T.summary: Nakanishi Mfg. Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells commercial kitchen equipment primarily in Japan. It offers cleaning system, rice system, disinfection storage, cooking and heating, and other equipment. The company markets its products to schools, hospitals, offices, fast food shops, restaurants, etc. Nakanishi Mfg. Co., Ltd. was founded in 1946 and is headquartered in Osaka, Japan.

5951.T.summary: Dainichi Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells oil fan heaters, ceramic fan heaters, gas fan heaters, humidifiers, coffee makers, and other products in Japan. The company was founded in 1964 and is headquartered in Niigata, Japan.

5956.T.summary: Toso Company, Limited develops, manufactures, and markets interior products worldwide. The company's products include decorative and functional curtain tracks, motorized curtain tracks, venetian and roller blinds, roman shades, vertical and pleated blinds, and panel tracks, as well as peripheral parts for motorized products. Toso Company, Limited was founded in 1949 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

5965.T.summary: Fujimak Corporation manufactures, sells, and services kitchen equipment in Japan and internationally. The company offers heating equipment, including combi oven series, VarioCooking center series, ovens, gas and induction heating stoves, griddles/salamanders, fryers, steamers, noodle boilers, dumpling grillers, warmers, package cookers, braising pans/rotary cooking kettles, and Chinese ranges, as well as electric ranges, tables, and stoves. It also provides cooling equipment, such as blast chillers and freezers, showcases, foods coolers, prefabricated refrigerators, and other cooling equipment; bakery equipment, such as convection and deck ovens, dough conditioners and proofers, mixers, molders, and reverse seat and shaping machine; rice cookers, storage/washers, and warmer/table top rice cooker equipment; washing and sterilizing equipment, such as dish washers and sterilizer cabinets; vacuum packing machines; and carts. The company serves institutions, schools, hospitals, hotels, restaurants, amusement parks, fast foods, convenience stores, factories/CK, canteens, ship kitchens, and others, as well as the government/public fields. Fujimak Corporation was founded in 1950 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

6291.T.summary: Airtech Japan, Ltd. designs, manufactures, and sells clean air systems, clean rooms, clean benches, air showers, bio safety cabinets, biohazard systems, etc. in Japan. It offers pass boxes, clean booths/FFU, isolators, infection control equipment and facilities, insect control facilities, and cleanroom facilities, as well as clean supplies, such as clean garments, gloves, masks, wafer box sealing tapes, sterile disposable wearing products, and vacuum cleaners. The company also provides dust and chemical dust removers/deodorizers, such as fume hoods, chemical dust removers, chemical hazard benches, draft chambers, vacuum cleaners, photocatalytic deodorizing machines, and photo-catalyst clean deodorizers. Airtech Japan, Ltd. was founded in 1973 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

6445.T.summary: Janome Sewing Machine Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells sewing machines and related products primarily in Japan. It manufactures and sells household sewing machines. The company also manufactures and sells industrial equipment, such servo press, tabletop robots, SCARA robots, Cartesian robots, etc; and 24-hour bath products, etc. In addition, the company sells school education materials, etc. Further, it operates 79 sewing machines stores. The company was formerly known as Empire sewing machine Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Janome Sewing Machine Co., Ltd. in January 1949. Janome Sewing Machine Co., Ltd. was founded in 1921 and is headquartered in Hachioji, Japan.

6484.T.summary: KVK Corporation manufactures and sells faucets in Japan. It offers bathroom, kitchen, and sink fixtures; pipes and pipe fittings; and other faucet parts. KVK Corporation was founded in 1939 and is headquartered in Gifu, Japan.

6612.T.summary: Balmuda Inc. engages in the design, development, manufacturing, marketing, and sale of home appliances in Japan and internationally. The company offers steam toasters, electric kettles, electric rice cookers, and microwave ovens; fans, portable circulator fans, air cleaners, and humidifiers; portable LED lanterns, solar LED desk lights, and LED desk light; wireless speakers and hover cleaners; notebook cooling stands; and consumables/parts, such as filter, battery, etc. It also offers curry sauces and a collection recipes. The company was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Tokyo, japan.

6924.T.summary: Iwasaki Electric Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells lighting products and industrial systems in Japan, North America, rest of Asia, and internationally. It operates through two segments, Lighting Sector; and Applied Optics and Environment Sector. The company provides light source products, such as LED lamps, ceramic metal halide lamps, metal halide lamps, high pressure sodium lamps, mercury products, and halogen lamps; and urbanscape, sports and floodlighting, and commercial and industrial lighting products. It also offers applied optics and environmental products that comprise environmental simulation systems, including high speed capture lighting products, solar simulation systems, and solar simulation photovoltaic products; UV/EB sterilization systems; water treatment systems; curing/cross-linking/polymerization systems; UV/EB cleaning systems; and light sources for special purposes. The company was formerly known as Iwasaki Radio Engineering and changed its name to Iwasaki Electric Co., Ltd. in 1945. Iwasaki Electric Co., Ltd. was founded in 1944 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

7807.T.summary: Kowa Co.,Ltd. manufactures and sells welfare nursing care products in Japan. It offers walking related products comprising walking cars; walking aids/walk assistance carts; silver cars; and single, telescopic, multi-leg, clutch, and option walking canes; bath aids, such as shower chairs, bath care belts, bathtub mats and footsteps, hand rails, and duckboards; and eating related products, including dishware products and utensils, and eating care goods. The company also provides sleeping related products consisting of underwear and everyday wear products, and socks, as well as bed related products, such as waterproof sheets and moving belts; and toilet related products, including furniture style portable toilets, acrylic resin portable toilets, urine bottles, insert bedpans, and various toilet support goods. In addition, it offers hygiene and health related products comprises mouth care goods and medicine boxes. The company serves chain stores, national welfare equipment lease companies, department stores, mail-order companies, and others, as well as wholesale trading companies for welfare equipment. Kowa Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1965 and is headquartered in Osaka, Japan.

7822.T.summary: Eidai Co.,Ltd. manufactures and sells residential building materials and wooden boards in Japan. The company offers flooring products, interior staircase sets, interior doors, closets, shoe storage units, kitchen and bathroom products, and particle boards. Eidai Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1946 and is headquartered in Osaka, Japan.

7885.T.summary: Takano Co.,Ltd. manufactures and sells office furniture, springs, exterior products, electronics-related products, and equipment for health and welfare in Japan. It provides medical and healthcare equipment, such as stretchers, wheelchairs, wheelchair cushions, walking aids, and others; exterior products that consist of awnings, parasols, and multi-utility room products; and office furniture, including swivel chairs and conference room chairs. The company also offers electromagnetic electrical components for various industrial equipment; spring and unit components, such as precision springs and spiral springs; inspection and measurement systems, such as LCD panel inspection systems, battery-related material inspection systems, and Web inspection systems; and UV laser machining and marking machines for high precision processing. In addition, it provides health foods. The company was formerly known as Takano Factory Co.,Ltd and changed its name to Takano Co.,Ltd. in 1973. Takano Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1941 and is headquartered in Nagano, Japan.

7887.T.summary: Nankai Plywood Co.,Ltd. manufactures and sells interior building materials in Japan. It offers storage, floor, and ceiling materials; and stairs, slide doors, fittings, and other products. The company was founded in 1942 and is headquartered in Takamatsu, Japan.

7959.T.summary: Oliver Corporation manufactures and sells general interior furniture products in Japan and internationally. The company offers sofa and lobby chairs; chairs; tables; exterior, kids related, and reception/office furniture; and cabinet, equipment, and other facilities. It markets its products for medical and elderly, corporate/welfare, station/airport/public, spa and hot bath, educational, hotel/ryokan/accommodation, bridal ,cafe, restaurant, and others facilities. The company was founded in 1967 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

7972.T.summary: Itoki Corporation manufactures and sells office and equipment-related products and services in Japan and internationally. The company offers workstation systems, desks, low partitions, office and conference room chairs, tables, related maintenance services, etc.; office building internal materials, movable and fixed walls, security equipment, factory and logistics equipment, commercial facility equipment, research facility equipment, etc.; and study desks and chairs, study and small office/home office furniture, etc. It also provides furniture and other products for healthcare facilities; bookshelf, auto racks, and find picker products for public facilities; safety deposit boxes and vault doors for financial institutions; and distribution equipment for factories and logistics facilities. The company offers its products under joyten brand name. Itoki Corporation was founded in 1890 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

7981.T.summary: Takara Standard Co.,Ltd. manufactures and sells enameled products. The company offers enameled system kitchens, wood system kitchens, enamel system baths, enameled washstands, sink units, heating appliances, hot water heaters, enameled wall covering materials, and other home appliances and equipment. It primarily sells its products through a network of 172 showrooms in Japan. The company was formerly known as Nippon Enamel Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Takara Standard Co.,Ltd. in 1971. Takara Standard Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1912 and is headquartered in Osaka, Japan.

7989.T.summary: Tachikawa Corporation, together with its subsidiary, designs, manufactures, markets, sells, and installs various window covering products and room partitions primarily in Japan. The company offers vertical blinds, roller blinds, roman shades, pleated shades, curtain rails, and other window coverings and interior finishing products for residential and office buildings, as well as public facilities. It is also involved in the manufacture and sale of parking systems, geared motors, motorized panel louvers, and movable partitions. The company was formerly known as Tachikawa Manufacturing Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Tachikawa Corporation in October 1947. The company was founded in 1938 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

7997.T.summary: Kurogane Kosakusho Ltd. manufactures and sells furniture for office work, facilities, home, and residential use. The company also manufactures and sells air conditioning and clean-room-related equipment. In addition, it manufactures and installs custom-made interiors and construction-related equipment. The company was founded in 1927 and is headquartered in Osaka, Japan.

8119.T.summary: Sanyei Corporation engages in the wholesale and retail of furniture and houseware, fashion accessories, and home appliances in Japan and internationally. The company offers furniture, such as beds and tables, as well as housewares comprising pots and tableware under the MINT and Villeroy & Bochb brands; fashion accessories, such as trolley luggage products, pouches, bags, and shoes under the BIRKENSTOCK and Kipling brand names; and beauty and kitchen appliances the Vitantonio, mod's hair, and MULTI CHEF brands. It also provides pets, pet products, transport materials, and industrial goods under the Pepica brand; iron pots under the CHASSEUR brand; cast-aluminum cookware under the WOLL brand name; watches under the KERBHOLZ brand; and home appliances under the ION-Sei brand name. In addition, the company operates a boutique under the Quorinest name, which offers various apparel and accessories; and pet salons and animal clinics. Further, the company provides logistic services, including product planning, development, and delivery services; and after sales services, as well as manufactures home appliances. The company was formerly known as SANYEI Boeki and changed its name to Sanyei Corporation in 1971. Sanyei Corporation was founded in 1946 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

8130.T.summary: Sangetsu Corporation, together with its subsidiaries, develops and sells interior decorating products in China and internationally. The company's products include wallcoverings, flooring materials, curtains, and upholstery products. It operates showrooms in Shinagawa, Nagoya, Fukuoka, Osaka, Sendai, Kanazawa, Hiroshima, and Okinawa. The company was formerly known as Sangetsudoshoten Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Sangetsu Corporation in 1970. Sangetsu Corporation was founded in 1849 and is headquartered in Nagoya, Japan.

8173.T.summary: Joshin Denki Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the sale, delivery, installation, maintenance, and repair of home appliances, information and communication equipment, entertainment products, and housing equipment and related products. It operates through a network of 239 stores and 24 service centers in Japan. The company was formerly known as Joshin Denki Sangyo Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Joshin Denki Co., Ltd. in April 1958. Joshin Denki Co., Ltd. was founded in 1948 and is headquartered in Osaka, Japan.

8186.T.summary: Otsuka Kagu, Ltd. provides furniture and interior products in Japan. It offers sofas, dining chairs and tables, bed mattresses, living tables, TV boards, book shelves, shelves, cupboards, storage furniture, desks/desk chairs, study desks, kids furniture, personal and reclining products, curtains, illuminations, carpets and rugs, beddings, interior and outlet goods, and reworth products. The company offers its products through retail stores and online. Otsuka Kagu, Ltd. was founded in 1969 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

9827.T.summary: Lilycolor Co., Ltd. plans, develops, and sells interior products in Japan. It offers wallpapers, custom curtains, and floorings under the Lilycala brand name to interior specialty stores, department stores, daily carpentry stores, accessory stores, housing manufacturers, design offices, construction companies, etc. The company is also involved in the design, construction, and project management of facilities and office spaces, as well as undertakes renovation and construction contracts for lodging, medical, and commercial facilities. The company was formerly known as Kawakichi Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Lilycolor Co., Ltd. in 1989. Lilycolor Co., Ltd. was founded in 1907 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

AJB.SG.summary: Airtech Japan, Ltd. designs, manufactures, and sells clean air systems, clean rooms, clean benches, air showers, bio safety cabinets, biohazard systems, etc. in Japan. It offers pass boxes, clean booths/FFU, isolators, infection control equipment and facilities, insect control facilities, and cleanroom facilities, as well as clean supplies, such as clean garments, gloves, masks, wafer box sealing tapes, sterile disposable wearing products, and vacuum cleaners. The company also provides dust and chemical dust removers/deodorizers, such as fume hoods, chemical dust removers, chemical hazard benches, draft chambers, vacuum cleaners, photocatalytic deodorizing machines, and photo-catalyst clean deodorizers. Airtech Japan, Ltd. was founded in 1973 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

TDF.F.summary: Takano Co.,Ltd. manufactures and sells office furniture, springs, exterior products, electronics-related products, and equipment for health and welfare in Japan. It provides medical and healthcare equipment, such as stretchers, wheelchairs, wheelchair cushions, walking aids, and others; exterior products that consist of awnings, parasols, and multi-utility room products; and office furniture, including swivel chairs and conference room chairs. The company also offers electromagnetic electrical components for various industrial equipment; spring and unit components, such as precision springs and spiral springs; inspection and measurement systems, such as LCD panel inspection systems, battery-related material inspection systems, and Web inspection systems; and UV laser machining and marking machines for high precision processing. In addition, it provides health foods. The company was formerly known as Takano Factory Co.,Ltd and changed its name to Takano Co.,Ltd. in 1973. Takano Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1941 and is headquartered in Nagano, Japan.

TKS.F.summary: Takara Standard Co.,Ltd. manufactures and sells enameled products. The company offers enameled system kitchens, wood system kitchens, enamel system baths, enameled washstands, sink units, heating appliances, hot water heaters, enameled wall covering materials, and other home appliances and equipment. It primarily sells its products through a network of 172 showrooms in Japan. The company was formerly known as Nippon Enamel Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Takara Standard Co.,Ltd. in 1971. Takara Standard Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1912 and is headquartered in Osaka, Japan.
